content: https://www.theblock.co/post/264702/the-sec-is-having-trouble-serving-hex-founder-richard-heart-with-its-lawsuitThe SEC is having trouble serving Richard Schueler, the Hex and PulseChain founder best known as Richard Heart, with its lawsuit for allegedly selling unregistered securities.how many people have lost their shirt due to this schmuck? but you gotta give it to him. he knows how to stay out of reach of USA authorities.
